STAN08.title: The Magicks of Megas-Tu
STAN08.path: ../Star Trek Animated Series/Star Trek Animated Series - 08 The Magicks of Megas-Tu.m4v
STAN08.description: At the centre of the galaxy, a race puts the Enterprise crew on trial for past grievances.

FETM07.title: That's All There Is
FETM07.path: ../From the Earth to the Moon/From the Earth to the Moon - 7 That's All There Is.m4v
FETM07.description: On the Apollo 12 mission rookie astronaut Alan Bean becomes the fourth person to walk on the moon.

RBBT09.title: The Emissary
RBBT09.path: ../Ray Bradbury Theater/Ray Bradbury Theater - 09 The Emissary.m4v
RBBT09.description: A pet dog brings things and people to his young master, a boy suffering from a debilitating illness, whenever it feels that he needs them. At first this proves quite useful but it takes a rather bizarre turn at the end.

BAPO1925.title: The Battleship Potemkin
BAPO1925.description: Russian dramatization of the mutiny that occurred in 1905 when the crew of the battleship Potemkin rebelled against its officers. Watch for one of the most celebrated scenes in film: the massacre of civilians on the Odessa Steps. Silent.

DRHI08.title: Wild West
DRHI08.description: Hold-outs fight to the bitter end at the Alamo, Billy the Kid goes on the run from lawman Pat Garrett, and Teddy Roosevelt rounds up the Rough Riders and goes to war. Guest starring Jake Johnson, Chris Parnell, Andy Daly and more.

ULTR16.title: Science Patrol Into Space
ULTR16.description: The Baltans abduct a spacecraft on its way to Venus in order to get revenge against Earth and Ultraman.

LITB039.title: Cat Out of the Bag
LITB039.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 039 Cat Out of the Bag.mp4
LITB039.description: In spite of Ward's misgivings, all goes well when Wally and Beaver volunteer to feed the neighbor's prize-winning cat, Puff Puff, until Wally breaks a promise, Beaver leaves a gate open and Eddie Haskell's dog chases Puff Puff up a tree.

OFUK08.title: Appraisals
OFUK08.description: David is doing staff appraisals which most of the staff approach with their usual level of enthusiasm. Part of the process is for them to to give feedback on David's performance and this seems to get most of his attention.

ULTR15.title: Terrifying Cosmic Rays
ULTR15.description: Mysterious space rays transform a child's two-dimensional drawing into a three-dimensional monster, who would rather sleep than fight.

ACGS08.path: ../All Creatures Great and Small/All Creatures Great and Small - 08 Where the Heart Is.m4v
ACGS08.title: Where the Heart Is

SPRA16.title: The Fire Race (part 1)
SPRA16.description: The Inca land of Kapetepek, noted for its secrecy and treasures, hosts a race with foreign and native drivers. To ensure their land's privacy, the Kapetepekan drivers must win, at any cost.

LITB038.title: Beaver's Guest
LITB038.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 038 Beaver's Guest.mp4
LITB038.description: Typical boyish shenanigans result in an eventful stay when Larry Mondello comes to spend the night with Beaver.

TREK16.title: The Galileo Seven
TREK16.path: ../Star Trek TOS/Star Trek - 16 The Galileo Seven.mp4
TREK16.description: The Galileo, under Spock's command, crash-lands on a hostile planet. As the Enterprise races against time to find the shuttlecraft, Spock's strictly logical leadership clashes with the fear and resentment of his crew.

CADF09.title: St. Peter's Fair
CADF09.description: Multiple homicides, a local tradesmen's revolt, and intrigue taint Shrewsbury's annual 3-day fair and strain Cadfael's friendship with Hugh Beringar.

SPRA15.title: The Desperate Desert Race (part 2)
SPRA15.path: ../Speed Racer/Speed Racer - 15 The Desperate Desert Race (part 2).mp4
SPRA15.description: Speed and Kim team up together to save Kim's country of Flathill from being taken over by criminal revolutionaries.

BSG108.title: The Young Lords
BSG108.path: ../Battlestar Galactica TOS/Battlestar Galactica 09 - The Young Lords.m4v
BSG108.description: Shot down by Cylons, Starbuck crash lands on Attila, a planet on the far edge of Omega Sector and finds himself rescued from a phalanx of Cylons by a family of children. Kyle, the young leader of these self proclaimed warriors, soon hatches a plan to trade Starbuck to Outpost commander Spectre for his captured father.

SOKO08.title: The Challenge of the Two-Headed Monster
SOKO08.description: Daisaku and Minami happen to help a one-eyes man BF members are chasing. According to the man's story, they are trying to kill him as a traitor because he became frightened by the inhumanity of the syndicate and quit it.

LRSS08.title: Out of the Loop
LRSS08.path: ../Larry Sanders Show, The/Larry Sanders Show, The - 08 Out of the Loop.m4v
LRSS08.description: Larry decides to get involved with the personal problems of his staff.

PATV07.title: The Surgeon
PATV07.path: ../Planet Of The Apes (Television)/Planet Of The Apes TV 07.mp4
PATV07.description: Galen risks his freedom, and life by contacting his old sweetheart, Kira, when Virdon is seriously injured. Kira is now a talented, and forward thinking, surgeon; and Galen shares with her a forbidden book on human anatomy, that he and Burke stole from Dr. Zaius' home, with her.

LITB037.title: Beaver Runs Away
LITB037.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 037 Beaver Runs Away.mp4
LITB037.description: Beaver decides to run away from home when he thinks he is unfairly reprimanded for allowing his friend Larry to accidentally drill holes in the Cleaver garage wall with Ward's electric drill.

CON108.title: Eat, Drink and Be Merry
CON108.description: Food preservation began with the storage of edibles in bottles and led to such 19th-century inventions as air conditioning, refrigeration and the thermos bottle. Also discusses the first hand-held guns and traces the development of rocketry in this century.

ICLD08.title: Reign of Terror
ICLD08.description: Sejanus divorces his wife in order to marry Livilla but Tiberius refuses permission and suggests that he marries Livilla's daughter Helen instead, which enrages Livilla.

TPOD10.title: France: September, 2089 AD
TPOD10.description: The boys stay on to help at a vineyard until after the grape harvest. When time comes to continue their journey, they find it hard to leave their new found friends.

RT66016.title: Fly Away Home (part 1)
RT66016.description: Tod and Buz, in Phoenix, Arizona, and looking for work with a crop-dusting company, encounter a combat-scarred, world-weary pilot who is a self-described "Jonah." The pilot hates himself for still being alive and causing others' deaths. Buz' interest in the pilot's chanteuse ex-wife is a side story.

LISP38.title: The Thief from Outer Space
LISP38.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 38 The Thief from Outer Space.m4v
LISP38.description: Will, Penny and Dr. Smith get involved with a thief that is searching for a princess.

MSTK0108.title: The Slime People
MSTK0108.description: The crew puts Commando Cody on trial for "crimes against reality" after watching the sixth episode of Radar Men while slime monsters invade Los Angeles in "The Slime People".

FWLT08.title: The Psychiatrist
FWLT08.description: Confusion arises when Basil tries to catch a girl in a playboy's room after hours, all the while unnerved by a psychiatrist's presence.

LITB036.title: Beaver and Henry
LITB036.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 036 Beaver and Henry.mp4
LITB036.description: Capturing a white rabbit in a home-made gopher trap is only one surprise that awaits the Cleavers when their new pet "Henry" turns out to be expectant-mother "Henrietta".

LITB040.title: Beaver's Poem
LITB040.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 040 Beaver's Poem.mp4
LITB040.description: Ward composes a simple verse for Beaver after the third grader waits until the night before it's due to write a poem for school; but the helpful dad's good intentions go awry when "Beaver's" poem is chosen to win a prize.

LISP37.title: The Deadly Games of Gamma 6
LISP37.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 37 The Deadly Games of Gamma 6.m4v
LISP37.description: Dr. Smith ends up in a boxing match with some space gladiators. If he wins he will return to Earth, and if he loses it won't matter because Earth won't be there.

ULTR07J.path: ../Ultraman (Japanese, Engligh Subtitled)/Ultraman - 07 The Blue Stone of Baradhi.mp4
ULTR07J.title: The Blue Stone of Baradhi

73B35270.path: ../Kaiju (Giant Monsters)/Gamera vs. Guiron (Attack of the Monsters, 1969, dubbed).m4v
73B35270.title: Gamera vs. Guiron (Attack of the Monsters, 1969, dubbed)

LISP36.title: The Android Machine
LISP36.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 36 The Android Machine.m4v
LISP36.description: Doctor Smith creates an android that they teach to be more human. A humanoid shows up looking for payment for the android.

RT66015.title: The Clover Throne
RT66015.description: Tod and Buz, in Indio, California for lunch, meet a flirtatious young woman. The two end up working at her guardian's date farm. The guardian wants to marry his ward despite her indifference. Complicating the situation is a disputed highway paving project and one of the road crew workers who has an interest in the girl.

NGSB1941.path: ../1940's Classics/Never Give a Sucker An Even Break (1941).mp4
NGSB1941.title: Never Give a Sucker an Even Break
